description: ff. 14. 176 x 125; 143 x 110 mm. 17 lin. cop. by ʻAlī ibn ḥasan ibn Hibat Allāh (i.e., Ibn ʻAsākir, d. 571/1176) - on fol. 14a-b four samāʻ - notes: according to the first, Ibn ʻAsākir heard the juzʼ together with other persons before Ibn Ṭāʼūs in Jumādá II, 527; according to the second samāʻ, the juzʼ was heard by a number of persons before Ibn ʻAsākir, 13 Ṣafar 570. Incip.: ... اخبرنا ... ابو محمد هبة الله بن احمد ... ابن طاووس بقراتى علىه
author: Qaṭṭān, al-ḥusayn ibn Yaḥyá, d. 946

title.@value: al-Juzʼ al-awwal min fawāʼid Abī ʻUbayd Allāh al-ḥusayn ibn Yaḥyá ibn ʻAyyāsh al-Qaṭṭān ʻan shuyūkhihi

creator: Qaṭṭān, al-ḥusayn ibn Yaḥyá, d. 946
subject: Hadith—Texts—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
